trans-unit.id: We did not receive a confirmation from your bank or card issuer.
trans-unit.source: We did not receive a confirmation from your bank or card issuer.
trans-unit.target: Не получихме потвърждение от вашата банка или издателя на картата.

trans-unit.id: You will receive a message as soon as we have received this.
trans-unit.source: You will receive a message as soon as we have received this.
trans-unit.target: Ще получите съобщение веднага щом го получим.

trans-unit.id: Please click here to try again.
trans-unit.source: Please click here to try again.
trans-unit.target: Моля, кликнете тук, за да опитате отново.

trans-unit.id: Please click here if you wish to try again
trans-unit.source: Please click here if you wish to try again
trans-unit.target: Моля, кликнете тук, ако искате да опитате отново
